overview:
Andrew Harries is the founding President and CEO of Zeugma Systems and has overseen the company’s development since its initial seed funding in October 2004.

In 1993, Andrew co-founded Sierra Wireless, Inc. and during his eleven years at that company held responsibility for marketing, sales, customer service, strategic alliances, product development, IT, manufacturing and supply chain management. During that period Sierra Wireless grew to over US$200 million in annual revenues.

Previously, Andrew held management positions with Motorola and was a management consultant in Europe. Andrew holds a Master of Business Administration degree from Simon Fraser University and received his early education and started his career in the UK and Ireland.

Andrew holds three US patents, chairs the SFU Business Department Dean’s External Advisory Board and is a member of the board of governors of Science World British Columbia.
